Rat Trap nodds.

"Oh, that's right, Lord Elder's correct, I do need a physi=
cal uplink in order ta do the dirty work. "

Night Shift nodds too.

"Okay,=
 then physical infiltration it is.  I could do with a little spy work mysel=
f, if I don't use my skills I'll lose my touch.  All right, I'm in on it."
=

Tucson grins.

"I agree.  Infiltration is the best method.  And to do it i=
ndirectly is even better.  Cheetor, Rat Trap, Nightshift, three of our best=
 infiltrators, who can virtually go in undetected.  Cheetor, Night Shift, y=
ou can probably cover the parameters in a shorter time span, so you will be=
 given the task of infiltrating the fortress from a wider vantage point.  R=
at Trap, you will take a more direct course through any small space you can=
 find at the fortress.  But keep in mind, first, you want to access the com=
plex, get a feel for your surroundings, and remain silent, so is not to be =
suspected too early in the game."

Rat Trap salutes.

"Gotycha Wheels.  Not=
 one peep outa me or one action till you say so."

Night Shift looks to Che=
etor.

"Meanwhile, we might be able ta draw up a map for Lord Elder'n Tucso=
n.  We get the lay of the land down, and we got a good chance at this missi=
on."

Straight Shot looks to them.

" You guys are still gonna need backup.=
 And since Tucson's needed here, because he's strong enough ta guard the Ar=
k, we should definitely have some solid protection out there for you."

She=
 turns her gaze over to Rodimus as if to drop a very subtle hint.

" And wh=
o better ta provide that than you.  I know you can do it Rodimus Prime, It'=
s like Tucson said, with faith in each other, we can do anything."

Tucson =
smiles.

" She's right, Rodimus, if anyone can be a stronghold for this mis=
sion, it's you.  She has faith in you, and so do I.  This may prove to be a=
 challenging mission but I know you are more than capable of doing it.  So,=
 as a fellow Prime, will you do me the honor of accepting her request?"

--=
